QuestData.Title: Stone Cold
QuestData.Description: Our assault on the Court of Bones continues. Our progress remains slow, but measurable.$B$BUnfortunately, we've received several reports of stone quilen statues coming to life without warning. These quilen are too dangerous to ignore.$B$BVenture into the Court of Bones and destroy any quilen statues that you can find.
QuestData.RewardText: I am glad to hear that you left the quilen in a thousand tiny pieces. They are little more than a nuisance to my work here on the island.
